QuestData.Title: When Life Gives You Crabs
QuestData.Description: There's a lot to do here, $c, but we need to keep an eye out for the gifts of fate.$B$BWhen the flood rolled in, right over our houses, it swept a good number of ocean dwellers with it. Menethil Bay's full of crabs now, large and ripe for the picking.$B$BWhen life gives you crabs, go crab fishing, I say. Bring me back the largest, meatiest claws you can find and I'll pay you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Meaty Crawler Claws from Harbor Crawlers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't bother with the smaller claws, they're more work to shell than the meat's worth.
QuestData.RewardText: A hearty seafood dinner will lift everyone's spirits and help us get the town back in shape again. Thanks for the help, $n.
